Banner.Description: Hi, my name is Nehar Harpreet and I'm a passionate Designer and Software Engineer . After completing a higher technical school in Computer Science, I'm currently finishing my Bachelor's degree in the same field. In my free time, I love editing pictures and creating my own designs. My diverse skill set allows me to bring a unique perspective to every project I work on.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hi, my name is Nehar Harpreet and I'm a passionate Designer and Software Engineer . After completing a higher technical school in Computer Science, I'm currently finishing my Bachelor's degree in the same field. In my free time, I love editing pictures and creating my own designs. My diverse skill set allows me to bring a unique perspective to every project I work on.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include:

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: 2x School
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Next Generation School Management System application made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Best Buy Mall
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Best Buy Mall is Online Shopping Mall where you can buy your groceries and household products from your favourite local stores. It has online chat,  order history, notification system on number and mail, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Mazhr
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Mazhr is a Finnish Intelligent Potential and Talent Management company. that help organizations to build better and more efficient teams by matching their Talent and Potentials. It has various installations made from scratch with auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Needle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Needle Music is a pioneer in the digital music industry as it allows users to create and manage their first and only Audiobiography. It built with the Spotify SDK Integration.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Covid Tracker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Covid Tracker is a web app which is built using the 3rd Party Api integration. This app shows the records from worldwise and countrywise that shows the who much patient are suffer from covid who many died from covid and how many are recoverd from covid

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Lets Chat
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A real-time chat application. Another fun side project :)

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Quiz App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page quiz app that has a minimal design, that has different level to attempt quizes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JWT Integration
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: JWT AUTHENTICATION IN NODE JS WITH POSTGREESQL DB

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
